name: Out of Smoke
description:
The crazy steampunk alchemist expelled from the Academy of Magicians and Scholars, Alchemecha, takes revenge on his colleagues by turning them into slave robots, ripping their books and spreading them around the world.The unexpeted heroes
It's up to Eneen, the only remaining wizard (because he was not accepted at the Academy) to save his magical arts colleagues by using his power of smoke manipulation. For this he counts on the help of an unexpected pupil: the ninja girl Rae. As well as the Smoke Buddies.A platformer with 90s feel
Out of Smoke is a platformer game inspired by 90's classics. With an intuitive mechanic, players must clear all the levels using both characters: Eneen can fly by creating a bird and attack with bats (both created with smoke). Rae is more agile, fast and can attack with her katana (normally lethal attacks, unlike Eneen). This in a fantastic world made up of multiple environments and many secrets (including the classic bonus stages).
